revised_title: The Effect of Space-Charge on Secondary Current in a Triode: A Theoretical Analysis
tldr: This article investigates the effect of space-charge on the secondary current in a triode. The authors develop a theoretical model to determine the relationship between the anode and grid potentials and the primary and secondary anode currents in the condition of space-charge limitation. The study provides insights into the behavior of secondary electrons and helps improve the understanding of vacuum electronics.
